Pt_Br.EmailSame: O e-mail deve ser differente do anterior.

En.EmailInvalid: The email must be in the format: example@domain.com
En.EmailSame: The email must be different from the current one.
En.PasswordLenght: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
En.PasswordNeedLowerCase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
En.PasswordNeedNumber: The password must contain at least one number.
En.PasswordNeedSpecial: The password must contain at least one special character.
En.PasswordNeedUpperCase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
En.PasswordSame: The new password cannot be the same as the current one.
